name: venue_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wiman_the_social_wi_fi_network.
Tool description: Get informations about wiman hotspots like name, city, coordinates etc .
API description: Searches for venues based on latitude, longitude, and optional radius using the Wiman API.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location to search.

longitude.description: The longitude of the location to search.

radius.description: The search radius in kilometers. Defaults to 1.
